  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1623</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chanukah.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chanukah.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chanukah.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chanukah.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chanukah.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Chanukah.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chanukah.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">in this unit, children will be aware of different cultures by developing discussion about people from different countries who have different customs holidays, food etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chanukah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holidays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cultures.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">in dieser Maßeinheit berücksichtigen Kinder 
unterschiedliche Kulturen, indem sie Diskussion über Leute aus 
unterschiedlichen Ländern, die unterschiedliche Gewohnheiten 
Feiertage haben, Nahrung usw. entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dans cette unité, les enfants se rendront compte de 
différentes cultures en développant la discussion au sujet des 
personnes des différents pays qui ont différentes vacances de 
douane, de la nourriture etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">nesta unidade, as crianças estarão cientes de culturas 
diferentes desenvolvendo a discussão sobre povos dos países 
diferentes que têm feriados diferentes dos costumes, do alimento 
etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">in questa unità, i bambini saranno informati delle 
colture differenti sviluppando la discussione circa la gente dai paesi
differenti che hanno feste differenti di dogana, dall'alimento ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σε αυτήν την μονάδα, τα παιδιά γνωρίζουν τους 
διαφορετικούς πολιτισμούς με την ανάπτυξη της συζήτησης για τους 
ανθρώπους από τις διαφορετικές χώρες που έχουν τις διαφορετικές 
τελωνειακές διακοπές, τα τρόφιμα κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">en esta unidad, los niños estarán enterados de diversas 
culturas desarrollando la discusión sobre la gente de diversos 
países que tengan diversos días de fiesta de los costumbres, del 
alimento etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
